name: Forehand Heel-to-Toe Wrist Shot
step_by_step: Start puck at heel, roll to toe and release

name: Backhand Heel-to-Toe Wrist Shot
step_by_step: Roll puck from heel to toe on backhand

name: Open Shoulder Forehand Snap Shot
step_by_step: Shoulder facing net, quick snap release

name: Backhand to Forehand Snap Shot
step_by_step: Pull puck to forehand and snap

name: Close Net Backhand-to-Forehand Under Bar
step_by_step: Start backhand, pull to forehand and lift under bar

name: Close Net Forehand-to-Backhand Under Bar
step_by_step: Start forehand, pull to backhand and lift

name: No-Look Forehand Wrist Shot
step_by_step: Shoot without looking at net

name: Toe Drag Around Obstacle Shot
step_by_step: Toe drag around obstacle and shoot

name: Toe Drag Wrist Shot
step_by_step: Toe drag then release

name: Push Away Change Angle Shot
step_by_step: Push puck away from body and shoot

name: Tight Toe Drag In-Feet Release
step_by_step: Toe drag tight into feet and shoot

name: Push Past Obstacle Shot
step_by_step: Push puck past obstacle and shoot

name: Chair Seated Shot
step_by_step: Shoot while seated in chair

name: Forehand Snap Shot Under Stick
step_by_step: Place cone with stick making a triangle. Stickhandle puck under the stick and snap the puck on net

name: Quick Release Wrist Shot
step_by_step: Minimal movement before release
coaching_cues: Shoot puck starting at toe of stick, not the heel

name: Backhand Quick Release
step_by_step: Backhand shot with minimal setup

name: Puck Protection Pull Shot
step_by_step: Protect puck then pull into shot

name: Lateral Pull Wrist Shot
step_by_step: Pull puck laterally and shoot

name: Fake Pass to Real Shot
step_by_step: Fake shot motion then reset and shoot

name: Backhand Pull-In Shot
step_by_step: Pull puck inward on backhand and release

name: One-Touch Forehand Shot
step_by_step: One touch then shoot immediately

name: Wide Reach Wrist Shot
step_by_step: Reach puck wide and shoot

name: Deceptive Eyes-Off-Net Shot
step_by_step: Look away from net then shoot

name: Uncomfortable Feet Position Shot
step_by_step: Shoot from awkward foot stance

name: Basic Slapshot
step_by_step: Release puck low then elevate late

name: Half Moon Shots
step_by_step: Place 8–12 pucks in a half-moon arc in front of you. Start lying down or prone beside the pucks. On “go,” grab one puck at a time and immediately shoot. Continue until all pucks are gone.
coaching_cues: No extra stickhandles, quick setup, shoot as soon as puck hits blade

name: Stickhandle Line Then Shoot (Backwards)
step_by_step: Set 3 pucks in a straight line. Stickhandle backward through the line (backward pulls only), exit the line, and immediately shoot. Reset and repeat.
coaching_cues: Head up, clean backward touches, fast transition to release

name: Continuous Lateral Slide + Shoot
step_by_step: Slide puck laterally across body, shoot. Reset laterally opposite direction and shoot again continuously.
coaching_cues: Keep feet moving, change release angle

name: Lateral Movement One-Timer
step_by_step: Move laterally, receive pass, shoot immediately without stickhandling.
